0.5.name: wordpress/wp-fastest-cache
0.5.description:
This plugin creates static html files from your dynamic WordPress blog. Setup of this plugin is so easy. You don't need to modify .htacces file. It will modified automatically.

  1. Mod_Rewrite which is the fastest method is used in this plugin
  2. All cache files are deleted when a post or page is published
  3. Admin can delete all cached files from the options page
